articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects General Tree Nursery under Construction
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects General Tree Nursery under Construction
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, inspected the general tree nursery now under construction by the KPA.
					 Commanding a bird's eye view of the general tree nursery, he said it is a patriotic legacy of leader Kim Jong Il who had made devoted efforts to turn the country into a socialist fairyland covered with green woods, paying deep attention to the afforestation all his life.
					
					 He called upon the officials and employees of the nursery and relevant units to carry forward the patriotic exploits of Kim Jong Il by implementing his behest to the letter. 
					
					 Then he went round different places of the nursery to learn in detail about its construction and management. 
					
					 Appreciating the environment control system established at the sapling greenhouse, he said the greenhouse appealed to him as it, with an area of 3000 square meters, is able to produce hundreds of thousands of saplings in a year.
					
					 He noted with satisfaction that the nursery proceeded with the work to cultivate and propagate trees of good species with great economic value and established an impeccable process for producing humus-pots of saplings.
					
					 The nursery has a very important role to play in turning the whole country into a thick woodland and greenery, he said, giving precious instructions for its smooth management and operation. 
					
					 Stressing the need to update the nursery, he said that more greenhouses should be built and its production base expanded so as to turn out ten millions of saplings in a year.
					
					 He urged the nursery to grow more saplings of species for timber forests and ornament, perfect the method for planting trees in disregard of seasons and push ahead with the work to produce sapling containers with various materials.
					
					 The general tree nursery should build up its scientific and technological forces and have necessary facilities in order to discharge its mission as not only a producer of saplings but also a base for research and dissemination of science and establish a Korean-style system for research and dissemination of science so that lower units can carry on the production of saplings and their manuring and cultivation as required by science and technology, he said.
					
					 It is the Party's fixed resolve and will to turn all the mountains of the socialist country into treasure and golden mountains covered with green woods true to the intention of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, he said, adding: We can never hand down naked mountains to the coming generation in an irresponsible manner.
					
					 The forest restoration should be carried through persistently as it is a long-term and strategic work, he stressed.
					
					 He said that all sectors and units should regard the forest restoration as an important policy and strategic task and the People's Army, in particular, should play a vanguard role in turning the country's mountains into a patriotic woodland covered with thick forests.
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Jae Il, Kim Yo Jong and Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Group of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Group of Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with the members of the group of Koreans in Japan for expressing thanks to the homeland on the 60th anniversary of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) led by Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of Chongryon Central Standing Committee, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Congratulations to Suriname's President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Congratulations to Suriname's President
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Desire Delano Bouterse on his reelection as president of Suriname.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and sincerely wished the president greater success in his responsible work for the progress of the country.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Farming in South Phyongan Province
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Farming in South Phyongan Province
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, made a field survey of farming in South Phyongan Province.
					 The premier visited the Paekam Farm in Sukchon County, the Wonhwa Co-operative Farm in Phyongwon County and the Sangbukdong Co-operative Farm in Mundok County, encouraging officials and agricultural workers in accelerating immediate farm work by introducing a scientific farming method including the water-saving farming method despite a long spell of drought.
					
					 He underscored the need to wind up the rice-transplanting in quality through scrupulous labor organization and the introduction of a new paddy rice cultivation method while channeling efforts into giving full play to the advantages of the sub-workteam management system on farms.
					
					 There took place on the spot a discussion on measures for supplying a sufficient amount of water, materials and fertilizers for farming.

articles.title: CPRK Spokesman Hits at S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
articles.content:
CPRK Spokesman Hits at S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) on Friday made public a statement to hit the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea for getting more hell-bent on the anti-DPRK smear campaign by setting in motion the conservative media.
					 On Thursday the south Korean puppet group prodded "News 1" to release a false report that last year the DPRK's patrol ship and fishing boat collided with Russia's submarine in the East Sea of Korea and the survivors were "forced to immigrate" to keep the collision secret. And they alleged that the fishing boat belongs to the "Chongjin Fishermen's Cooperative" and the patrol ship number is 679.
					
					 This is another intolerable provocation to the DPRK, the statement said, adding:
					
					 There happened no such collision, to say nothing of casualty or "forcible immigration". Moreover, there exist no "Chongjin Fishermen's Cooperative" and patrol ship No. 679.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is so engrossed in the confrontation with compatriots that a surrounding country was abused in their anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					
					 What can not be overlooked is that riff-raffs of Chosun Ilbo, Dong-A Ilbo and other conservative media in south Korea are getting hell-bent on the false report to defame the dignity of the DPRK and its socialist system centered on the popular masses.
					
					 Behind the frantic anti-DPRK smear propaganda by such conservative media persons are Park Geun Hye and her group.
					
					 The Park group is now zealously instigating the reactionary, conservative media to the anti-DPRK smear campaign. This is their last-ditch efforts to tide over the serious crisis the south Korean regime faces, destabilized by the ever-growing political and military might of the DPRK and forsaken by the people.
					
					 Such vicious confrontation maniacs as the Park group are so shameless as to talk about "dialogue" though they have spoiled the inter-Korean relations through smear campaign.
					
					 Their invectives to be cursed will only hasten their shameful ruin.
					
					 Not only the Park group keen on anti-DPRK farce but also those riff-raffs of conservative media hell-bent on treachery for a petty amount of money will face the merciless retaliation and punishment by the DPRK.
					
					 The Park group should not run amuck, clearly mindful that the hysteric anti-DPRK smear campaign can never save them from the quagmire of ruin.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Assails U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Group's Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Assails U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Group's Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign 
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Recently, the south Korean puppet group of traitors, in collusion with forces hostile to the DPRK including the U.S., has become ever more desperate in its anti-DPRK "human rights" racket, driving the north-south relations into an extreme phase.
					 The group staged a farce of "signing an agreement" with riff-raffs under the mask of the UN, which confirmed the establishment of a "UN office for human rights performance in the north" in Seoul. It is now noisily advertising that the "office" will go operational in June.
					
					 On May 27 the group held an anti-DPRK confab with the U.S. and Japanese chief negotiators to the six-party talks, at which it cried out for increasing "pressure upon the north" and ratcheting up "sanctions" upon it over its "human rights issue."
					
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) in its information bulletin No. 1094 on Friday terms the above-said reckless moves unpardonable hideous politically-motivated provocations challenging the dignity and social system of the DPRK and an open declaration of war against it.
					
					 The above-said "office" which abused the name of the UN is no more than a plot-breeding body against the DPRK to all intents and purposes as it was cooked up by the puppet group and its followers in league with "defectors from the north", human scum, pursuant to the U.S. scenario, the bulletin says and goes on:
					
					  The puppet group's desperate bid to see the "UN office" appear in Seoul is, in a final analysis, aimed to invent a pretext for provoking a war against the DPRK to realize the wild ambition for "unification through absorption" with the backing of the U.S.
					
					  The puppet group is keen to realize its political ambition through the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket but nothing is more foolish than this.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group should bear in mind that it will become a primary target of the Paektusan army which shows no mercy for the enemy and will be bound to meet the most miserable end from the very moment the "office" is inaugurated.
					
					 The UN should no longer repeat its shameful precedent of playing the role of a guide to U.S. interference and aggression against sovereign states, having its name abused by such morally depraved ones as the U.S. and the puppet group, the worst human rights abusers in the world.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet group will have to pay dearly for operating such "office."

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Omani Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Omani Delegation
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with a delegation of the Foreign Ministry of Oman led by Vice-Minister Ahmed Bin Yosif Obaid Al Harthi which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

articles.title: Talks between Chairmen of DPRK, German Parliamentary Groups Held
articles.content:
Talks between Chairmen of DPRK, German Parliamentary Groups Held
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Talks between Ri Jong Hyok, chairman of the DPRK-Germany Friendship Parliamentary Group, and Hartmut Koschyk, chairman of the German-Korean Parliamentary Friendship Group, took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side was Kim Ung Chol, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly, and from the German side were Hartmut Koschyk and his party and Thomas Schaefer, German ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on boosting the relations between the two parliamentary groups and a series of issues of mutual concern.

articles.title: Secretary General of Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate of Italy Here
articles.content:
Secretary General of Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate of Italy Here
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate of Italy, and his party arrived here on Friday.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia headed by Ivan Abramov, member of the Committee on Regional Policy and the North and the Far East Issues of the State Duma of the Russian Federation, left here on Friday.

articles.title: Vietnamese Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Vietnamese Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Academy of Social Science of Vietnam headed by Vice-President Vo Khanh Vinh left here on Friday.

articles.title: Omani Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Omani Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Foreign Ministry of Oman led by Vice-Minister Ahmed Bin Yosif Obaid Al Harthi left here on Friday.

articles.title: Home-visiting Groups of Korean Students in Japan Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Home-visiting Groups of Korean Students in Japan Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Home-visiting groups of students of Korean high schools in Japan visited the equestrian statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the Mansudae Art Studio Friday. They were led by O Pyong U, principal of Aichi Korean Middle and High School, and Jon Jin Song, principal of Kyusu Korean Middle and High School.
					 They laid bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Catfish Supplied to Schools, Baby Home, Orphanage and Home for Aged
articles.content:
Catfish Supplied to Schools, Baby Home, Orphanage and Home for Aged
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The production of catfish has doubled on the Pyongyang Catfish Farm and its cycle has been cut down almost two months as compared with the same period last year.
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un paid a visit to the Pyongyang Catfish Farm in December last year during which he instructed it to boost the production by making an effective use of the existing production capability.
					
					 Officials, workers, scientists and technicians of the General Bureau of Public Service, the Pyongyang Catfish Farm and the relevant units energetically pushed forward projects for updating and worked hard to attain their goal to increase the catfish production.
					
					 Vans with a full load of fresh catfish headed for the revolutionary schools, baby home, orphanage and home for the aged in Pyongyang on Thursday.

articles.title: More Successes Achieved in Projects for Improving Educational Conditions and Environment
articles.content:
More Successes Achieved in Projects for Improving Educational Conditions and Environment
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has achieved successes in the projects for improving the educational conditions and environment.
					 At least hundreds of school building construction and expansion projects have been completed across the country. As a result, thousands of new classrooms have made their appearances.
					
					 Various modern educational apparatuses for experiment and practice including electronic blackboards and computer-aided display of objects for teaching have been set up to make at least 10 000 classrooms multi-functional.
					
					 Pyongyang City is taking the lead in the school construction and projects for updating educational facilities.
					
					 At least 3,000 classrooms of many schools in the city have become multi-functional thanks to the above-said drive.
					
					 Factories under ministries and national institutions including the ministries of Chemical Industry, Public Health and Machine-building Industry have provided sufficient quantities of equipment for experiment and practice.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Deceiving International Community
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Deceiving International Community
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Recently, The U.S. is keen on deceiving the international community by describing the DPRK's test-fire of SLBM as "provocation" and "threat," only to bring to light once again how shameless Yankee-style standard is, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The criminal acts perpetrated by the U.S. for over half a century against the DPRK are based on the unilateral and self-righteous Yankee-style standard, from A to Z.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists cried out for enforcing international "trusteeship rule" over Korea, asserting the Korean people who were liberated from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule lacked "autonomous ability." 
					
					 Claiming the puppet regime of south Korea was set up by the UN and the UN is obliged to support the regime, the U.S. hurled its allies into the Korean war.
					
					 Before and after the beginning of the  21st century the U.S. has worked to build up public opinion against the DPRK by pulling up it in the international arena over such issues as "nuclear", "missile" and "human rights issues".
					
					 Lurking behind it is the ulterior aim of the U.S. to cover up its true colors as aggressor and interferer, garner international support for its scenario for dominating the whole of Korea, lay a siege of worldwide sanctions and pressure to the DPRK and thus attain with ease the goal of its hostile policy toward it.
					
					 The U.S. has remained unchanged in employing its crafty method of aggression. Now that the undesirable hostile forces continue challenging the DPRK, its service personnel and people will redouble their efforts to further bolster up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence.

articles.title: Japanese Defense Minister's Reckless Outbursts Assailed
articles.content:
Japanese Defense Minister's Reckless Outbursts Assailed
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Japan Minister of Defense Nakatani who appeared at a TV channel went the lengths of blustering that the "Self-Defense Forces" can make a preemptive attack on the missile base of the DPRK in support of the U.S. forces by exercising its "right to collective self-defense."
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Friday says:
					
					 There were not a few warmongers in Japan who unhesitatingly let loose invectives of strong militarist nature but Nakatani was the first to dare cry out for a preemptive attack on the DPRK under the pretext of the "right to collective self-defense."
					
					 What Nakatani spoke represented the attitude of the Japanese authorities.
					
					 Acts of distorting the crime-woven past history and inciting social climate for launching reinvasion are rampant in Japan.
					
					 Japan will inevitably be involved in the U.S. war of aggression in the future. It is what the Japan reactionaries hope for. Regarding it as a good opportunity for realizing its wild ambition for overseas invasion, Japan is working hard to translate its old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" into reality.
					
					 What Nakatani uttered reflected such ulterior design of the Japanese reactionaries.
					
					 Japan is seized with overconfidence after the revision of the "guidelines for defense cooperation with the U.S" which paved the way for exercising the "right to collective self-defense". Tokyo is utterly unaware of who its rival is.
					
					 It is no more than a pipe dream for Japan to calculate that it can browbeat the DPRK with the backing of the U.S.

articles.title: Deployment of THAAD Opposed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Deployment of THAAD Opposed in S. Kore
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held the 157th rally for peace and disarmament in Seoul on May 26 in protest against the U.S. projected deployment of THAAD in south Korea.
					 Speakers at the rally said high-ranking officials of the U.S. are pressurizing the "government" of south Korea, insisting on the necessity of THAAD deployment.
					
					 The Defense Ministry accepted the deployment, yielding to the U.S. pressure, and furthermore, announced that it would discuss it at the defense ministerial talks with the U.S., they charged, adding:
					
					 We strongly oppose the deployment of THAAD as it will escalate military tension and lay a stumbling block in the way of achieving peace and reunification of Korea, the tasks of the nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Prosecution Indicts Member of Former Progressive Party
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Prosecution Indicts Member of Former Progressive Party
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Changwon District Prosecutor's Office indicted and restrained a member of the former Unified Progressive Party (UPP) on the charge of violation of the notorious "Security Law," according to CBS of south Korea.
					 The prosecution reportedly took such action for the mere reason that the person praised the DPRK, alleging he has posted on website a lot of "literature and articles benefiting enemy" since 2010.
					
					 The puppet south Korean regime is kicking up a whirlwind of suppression of the members of the former UPP after dissolving the party by branding it as a "party following the north."

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Central Committee Marked in Myanmar, Benin
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Central Committee Marked in Myanmar, Benin 
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Meetings, film shows and photo exhibition took place in Myanmar and Benin on May 19 and 22 to mark the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and publications introducing the DPRK. 
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Pyongyang Today". 
					
					 Tin Tin Moe, member of the Executive Committee of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, said:
					
					 Under the wise guidance of HE Kim Jong Il the WPK led the Korean people to steady victories without any deviation from its line and the DPRK proudly emerged a politico-ideological power and military power. 
					
					 The history of the WPK is featured by the victories the Korean people have won by meeting all challenges of the hostile forces under the leadership of the great President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar should learn from the example set by the WPK. 
					
					 The vice-president of the Socialist Party of Benin said Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the party which is fully responsible for the destiny of the people and is taking care of them and faithfully serving them.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Supports Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Supports Korea's Reunification
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "By our nation itself" on its website on May 20 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The article said:
					
					 More than a decade has passed since the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, a landmark for Korea's reunification, was adopted in June, 2000, but the idea of By our nation itself, the basic spirit of the declaration, y remains an invariable banner of Korea's reunification.
					
					 The idea of By our nation itself reflects the firm spirit of independence.
					
					 Korea's reunification is a matter to be resolved by the concerted efforts of the Koreans responsible for it in line with their will and desire.
					
					 Peace and security on the Korean peninsula precisely means peace and security of the world.
					
					 The said idea also reflects the spirit of great national unity.
					
					 It is thanks to the said idea that the north and the south could demonstrate the great national unity though they had been hostile to each other and had stood in confrontation for over a half century.
					
					 The international community hopes that the north and the south of Korea will remain true to the idea of By our nation itself to the last.

articles.title: Korean Film Show Held in Germany
articles.content:
Korean Film Show Held in Germany
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- A film show was held by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on May 23 on the occasion of the period for solidarity with the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					 The participants in the film show watched a Korean film documenting the Songun leadership exploits of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un has protected the sovereignty of the DPRK and led the building of a thriving nation to victory, making ceaseless journeys for field guidance with his indefatigable efforts.
					
					 The DPRK's recent successful test-fire of SLBM marked a historical event in which it further bolstered up its military muscle and dealt a telling blow at the imperialists.
					
					 We fully support all measures taken by the DPRK for increasing its national defence capability and achieving national reunification.
					
					 We will hold diverse events including film show, seminar, solidarity meeting and book and photo exhibition in the period of solidarity with the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea in response to the appeal of the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Polish Organization Accuses Japanese Authorities of Suppressing Chongryon
articles.content:
Polish Organization Accuses Japanese Authorities of Suppressing Chongryon
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The Polish branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a statement on May 24 in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Japanese police authorities took an illegal action to search the houses of Chongryon officials and arrest them on May 12 on charges of violation of "law on foreign exchange".
					
					 This fascist action was a product of the Japanese reactionaries' moves to stamp out the Koreans in Japan and their organization Chongryon.
					
					 History and facts go to prove that the Japanese reactionaries have not given up their hostility towards Koreans and ambition for aggression since their defeat in the Second World War.
					
					 We strongly demand the Japanese authorities discontinue their actions against the DPRK and Chongryon and make an apology and reparation to the Korean nation for their past crimes.

articles.title: AAPSO Blasts U.S. Secretary of State's Reckless Remarks against DPRK
articles.content:
AAPSO Blasts U.S. Secretary of State's Reckless Remarks against DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization (AAPSO) made public a statement on May 24 condemning U.S. Secretary of State Kerry's remarks against the DPRK.
					 Kerry let loose a spate of invectives against the DPRK during his recent junket to south Korea, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 What he uttered was no more than jargons of a loser admitting the failure of the Obama administration's DPRK policy. And it was nothing but last-ditch efforts of the U.S. to evade the responsibility for having driven the DPRK-U.S. relations into the lowest ebb.
					
					 The U.S. has lost qualifications to talk about dialogue and the nuclear issue as it has persistently pursued its anachronistic policy to stifle the DPRK. 
					
					 This is clearly evidenced by the fact that in January last the DPRK showed its willingness to put a moratorium on the nuclear test if the U.S. temporarily discontinues the provocative joint military exercises against it but Washington turned down this offer, scuppering the last chance to settle the nuclear issue. 
					
					 We strongly demand the U.S. make a fundamental switchover in its viewpoint on the DPRK if the ongoing trend of vicious cycle of confrontation and tension is to be stemmed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Almaciga Universal de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Almaciga Universal de EPC
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Almaciga Universal que el EPC construye nuevamente.
					Al presenciar el panorama de almaciga, el Mariscal dijo que esta es el patrimonio patriotico del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien durante toda su vida presto profunda atencion a la repoblacion forestal del pais y dedico toda su abnegacion para transformar el territorio patrio en un paraiso socialista maravilloso con bosques frondosos.
					
					Apunto que los funcionarios y empleados de la Almaciga Universal y de la rama interesada deben realizar las inmortales hazanas patrioticas del Dirigente mediante la materializacion cabal de su legado.
					
					Recorriendo varios puntos de la almaciga, averiguo en detalles el estado de construccion y administracion.
					
					Expreso satisfaccion de que se haya construido el invernadero capaz de producir en un ano cientos de miles de posturas de arboles en la superficie de 3 mil metros cuadrados y aprecio el sistema de control del ambiente interior del  invernadero.
					
					Evaluo que la almaciga organiza bien la labor para cultivar y expandir ampliamente las posturas de buena especie y de gran valor economico y acondiciono perfectamente el proceso de produccion de cubetas de humus de posturas.
					
					El Mariscal senalo que para la reforestacion de todo el pais, es muy importante la mision de la Almaciga Universal y dio instrucciones preciosas para su administracion.
					
					Deben modernizar mas la almaciga, dijo y continuo que deben construir mas invernaderos y ampliar la base de produccion para que puedan producir en un ano 10 millones de posturas de arboles.
					
					Deben cultivar las posturas necesarias a la formacion de bosques madereros y tambien muchas posturas de arboles de valor decorativo, completar el metodo de plantacion sin restringirse a las estaciones y desplegar con vigor la produccion de las vasijas de posturas con variados materiales, acoto.
					
					Ordeno que la Almaciga Universal debe disponer de firmes fuerzas cientificas y tecnicas y los establecimientos necesarios para cumplir su mision de base productiva de posturas de arboles y de investigacion y divulgacion cientificas y establecer el autoctono sistema la investigacion y divulgacion cientificas para que las unidades subordinadas puedan producir y cultivar las posturas de arboles conforme a la demanda cientifica y tecnica.
					
					Cubrir de frondosos bosques todos los montes patrios en acato al proposito de los grandes Lideres es la firme decision y voluntad del Partido, senalo y subrayo que nunca debemos legar sin responsabilidad a las generaciones venideras los montes pelados.
					
					Y dijo que la reforestacion del pais es el trabajo prolongado y estrategico, asi que deben acelerarla tenazmente hasta culminarla.
					
					El Mariscal subrayo que todos los sectores y unidades deben tomar la reforestacion del pais como importante tarea politica y estrategica y exhorto al EPC a desempenar el papel de vanguardia para transformar todos los montes patrios en frondosos bosques patrioticos.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Jae Il, Kim Yo Jong y Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con grupo de agradecimiento de Chongryon
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con grupo de agradecimiento de Chongryon
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 29 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el grupo de agradecimiento de los coreanos residentes en Japon por el 60o aniversario de la fundacion de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon), encabezado por el vicepresidente del Presidium del Comite Central de esta entidad, Pae Ik Ju.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al reelecto presidente de Surinam
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al reelecto presidente de Surinam
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio este viernes un mensaje de felicitacion al reelecto presidente de la Republica de Surinam, Desire Delano Bouterse.
					Convencido de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre los dos paises se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas en el futuro, el remitente desea de todo corazon al destinatario mayores exitos en sus responsabilidades para el progreso del pais.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre granjas de provincia de Phyong-an del Sur
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre granjas de provincia de Phyong-an del Sur
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno el estado de las faenas agricolas de las granjas de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
					Pak recorrio la granja de Paek-am del distrito Sukchon, la granja cooperativa de Wonhwa del distrito Phyongwon y la de Sangpukdong del distrito Mundok y estimulo a los funcionarios y trabajadores agricolas que aceleran los inmediatos trabajos agricolas al introducir los cientificos metodos inclusive el metodo de cultivo con poca agua aun en la condicion desfavorable por la sequia continua.
					
					Exhorto a las granjas a concentrar las fuerzas para manifestar la superioridad del sistema de autoadministracion por subgrupo, organizar con minuciosidad la mano de obra y concluir cualitativamente la trasplantacion de posturas de arroz mediante el cultivo avanzado de posturas y el metodo de cultivo de posturas en cubetas de humus.
					
					En el terreno, fueron abordadas las medidas para suministrar el agua, los materiales y abono necesarios a la agricultura.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia plan de instalacion de "oficina de DDHH de Norte" de ONU
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia plan de instalacion de "oficina de DDHH de Norte" de ONU
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- En estos dias, en contubernio con Estados Unidos y otras malsanas fuerzas enemigas, la banda traidora titere del Sur de Corea lleva a la coyuntura catastrofica las relaciones intercoreanas, recurriendo mas brutalmente al alboroto intrigante de "derechos humanos" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Sobre todo, la banda titere habla de que la puerta de la "oficina de derechos humanos del Norte (de Corea)" se abrira dentro de junio que viene, tras firmar con la chusma puesta de casco de la ONU el "convenio" sobre su instalacion en Seul.
					
					Y en una reunion con los delegados jefes de EE.UU. y Japon a las conversaciones a 6 bandas, sostenida el pasado dia 27, dijo que recrudecera la "presion y la sancion al Norte" bajo el pretexto del "problema de DDHH".
					
					En la informacion no.1094 publicada el dia 29, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria definio el establecimiento de la oficina como intolerable acto provocativo contra la dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC y abierta declaracion de guerra contra esta.
					
					La "oficina" a instalarse abusando del nombre de la ONU, es un aparato conflictivo anti-RPDC, inventado bajo el guion del imperio por la banda surcoreana y sus fuerzas seguidoras con los "fugitivos norcoreanos".
					
					Adelanta asi el documento y continua:
					
					La presente intencion de la banda surcoreana es buscar el pretexto de la guerra de agresion a la RPDC a fin de realizar la ambicion de "la unificacion mediante la absorcion".
					
					Ella trata de satisfacer vanamente su ambicion politica con el alboroto de "DDHH" anti-RPDC.
					
					La banda de Park Geun-hye debe tener presente que sufrira el fin mas tragico siendo el primer blanco de golpe implacable de fuerzas armadas del monte Paektu desde cuando ponga la placa en la puerta de la "oficina de DDHH del Norte".
					
					EE.UU. y la banda surcoreana sentiran en carne propia cuan tragico sera el resultado de la instalacion de la "oficina" en Seul.
